panels.description: Blast RRT - similar Round Trip Latency PCoIP

targets.query: SELECT mean("RTT") FROM "vmview_blast_session" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "objectname" fill(null)

panels.description: Round trip latency in milliseconds between the PCoIP server and the PCoIP client.

targets.query: SELECT mean("RTT") FROM "vmview_blast_session" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "objectname" fill(null)

panels.title: PCoIP RTL

panels.description:
RX

Total number of received packets that have been lost since the PCoIP session started.

TX

Total number of transmitted packets that have been lost since the PCoIP session started.

targets.query: SELECT mean("Estimated_Bandwidth_(Uplink)") FROM "vmview_blast_session" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "objectname" fill(null)

panels.title: PCoIP Packets Lost

panels.description: Number of imaging frames that were encoded over a one-second sampling period.

targets.query: SELECT mean("Estimated_Bandwidth_(Uplink)") FROM "vmview_blast_session" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "objectname" fill(null)

panels.title: PCoIP FPS

panels.description:
RX

Overall bandwidth for incoming PCoIP packets averaged over the sampling period, in seconds.

TX

Overall bandwidth for outgoing PCoIP packets averaged over the sampling period, in seconds.

targets.query: SELECT mean("Estimated_Bandwidth_(Uplink)") FROM "vmview_blast_session" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "objectname" fill(null)

panels.title: PCoIP Network Bandwidth

targets.query: SELECT last("Percent_Processor_Time") FROM "win_cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT last("Private_Bytes") AS "Current" FROM "win_proc" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "instance"
